title: Bound by Love
description: In the latest trilogy from Carolyn Faulkner come three HOT tales... In "Angel of Sudden Hill" and "The Centurion" you are transported to Rome for adventures (and spankings, of course) you will not soon forget! "Sold!" is a BONUS story set in the Old West with a stern leading man and a woman that needs to learn a little discipline...
author: Carolyn Faulkner
